newsitem.title: UK: Hagmann joins Lehman's industrial analysis team.
newsitem.headline: Hagmann joins Lehman's industrial analysis team.

text.p: Michael Hagmann has joined investment bank Lehman Brothers as a pan-European engineering analyst within its industrial, manufacturing and technology team.

In a statement on Tuesday, Lehman said Hagmann had spent three years at UBS covering the European engineering sector in Frankfurt and most recently in London. Prior to that he worked at Merrill Lynch, analysing the European capital goods sector.
